question: Hello, my name is James Flaherty and I am an Artificial Intelligence researcher. I believe that the NLP field is currently focusing too much on scaling up Machine Learning models. I am originally from Cambridge, Massachusetts and currently reside in San Francisco, California. These are valuable enough considerations to warrant restrictions on the dissemination of research that is under review.
